title.narrative: Climate Envelope 2013: Preparation of Green Climate Fund (GCF)

description.narrative: The object of this project is to provide financial support for the administrative budget of the Green Climate Fund under the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) to help enable the Fund Secretariat, Board and Interim Trustee to finalize the details of its institutional structure and operational policies, and set the stage for the Fund to become the main global fund for climate finance. Supporting the work to develop a transparent and effective institutional framework is crucial to meet the essential requirements for the Fund to receive, manage, programme and disburse financial resources. The Fund will be of paramount importance for the framework of global climate finance that is crucial in the work to meet the USD100 billion a year commitment to support climate change action in developing countries.
